transArray.content: The room is hygienic and clean. The hotel is located close to the subway station. It is very convenient to travel. The breakfast is also very good. The front desk service is also great@

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. The hotel is located near the West Fourth Ring Auxiliary Road, opposite Exit A of Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, with convenient transportation. I'm glad to see your positive recognition of our hygiene, breakfast, and front desk service in your review. Before guests check in, we will conduct ward rounds, clean the rooms and change the sheets to ensure that all guest supplies are changed "one for each guest". Please feel free to check in. We will continue to work hard and continue to do a good job in all aspects. I believe that you will stay with us next time You will get a better stay experience. All the hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy life! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
